title: Dark Souls III DLC: The Ringed City

replies.msg:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FZs56rGJyf4

Fear not the dark, ashen one. Journey to the world’s end to search for the Ringed City and encounter new lands, new bosses, new enemies with new armor, magic and items. Experience the epic final chapter of a dark world that could only be created by the mind of Hidetaka Miyazaki. A New World. One Last Journey. Dark Souls™ III: The Ringed City™ will be available on March 28th, 2017 on the PlayStation 4!

利申：DS3 都未爆的新手
咁岩係 youtube 見到出左新預告片，連登又好似未有人講，就開個 post 講下
